name: Heaps of Leaps - Free
description:
Heaps of Leaps is a highly addictive endless jumping game.
Leap your way onto the top of the Leaderboards with Heaps of Leaps unique One Touch Control.
How will you rank amongst your Friends and the World?!

This is the FREE version of "Heaps of Leaps".

This game contains Ads (which can be disabled with In-App Purchase).
NOTICE: Performance may be slow on older devices when Ads are Enabled.

Leaderboards and Achievements are shared between the Free and Paid versions.

------------------------
••••• FEATURES •••••
------------------------
• One Touch Control
• 4 Game Modes
• Leaderboards
• Achievements


For any feedback or bug reporting please contact us.
Twitter: @HeapsofLeaps
Email: HeapsofLeaps@gmail.com
